ygData.subject: RE: Sean.Clark@UCHSC.edu
ygData.msgSnippet: I am just in disbelief a note like this was posted to  this mailing list. We live in a sad sad sad world. It s called setting a rule to trash and delete
ygData.messageBody:
I am just in disbelief a note like this was posted to this mailing list. We
live in a sad sad sad world. It's called setting a rule to trash and delete
anything you recieve from the guy. Learn it and live by it, and stop trying
to make a quick buck at others expense.



>From: "John A. Williams" <John_Williams@...>
>Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>To: "'EQCheats@onelist.com'" <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Sean.Clark@...
>Date: Wed, 4 Aug 1999 13:56:51 -0400
>
>From: "John A. Williams" <John_Williams@...>
>
>That's a good question, what are you talking about?
>If you're going to babble to the list please fill us in.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: A Good Egg [SMTP:douglas@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 1:52 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Sean.Clark@...
>
> From: A Good Egg <douglas@...>
>
> On Wed, 4 Aug 1999, Nick wrote:
>
> > Well, I warned this person to stop emailing me.
>
> What ARE you babbling about?
>
> You're a very silly person, aren't you?
> --
> We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
> with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
> of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
>
>
